segments.text: I can't believe my eyes—the sink is just gushing water out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, polishing her plate totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A huge puddle's spreading across the floor already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And behind her, kids are raiding the cookie jar!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretched out on a stool that's about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies with one hand and balancing a plate with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, expecting her treat any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's open to a peaceful garden—such a shock compared to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, but chaos all around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's spotless so far, but not for long.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors swing open, framing the sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knew a simple kitchen could hold so many surprises?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's still on full blast—unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never expected to see mischief like this unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
